news_header: Attendo initiates change negotiations affecting around 2,300 employees, with a potential reduction of up to 570 work years.
news_text: Attendo has announced the start of change negotiations in elderly care homes across several locations, impacting approximately 1,800 employees across 13 welfare regions. The estimated need for reductions is around 250 work years. Previously, negotiations were initiated for about 400 employees in parts of Pirkanmaa and Satakunta, with a potential reduction of up to 145 employees. In total, the negotiations could affect around 2,300 employees and lead to a maximum reduction of about 570 work years.
